name: Siege at SPC
description:
Co-op + single player third person shooter where you defend your server from the relentlessly attacking extinct mammals.

Keep moving, keep shooting and keep upgrading your arsenal to win in this inside-joke of a game with beautiful retro 3d aesthetics.

The game is powered by the FTE QuakeWorld engine. The engine is GPLv2, but the QuakeC source code of the game itself is included in the downloads in the source directory and licensed under the MIT license. Needs the FTEQCC compiler to compile.

Features:

- 2 whole maps

- Multiple different enemy types

- Runs on a Quake based engine

- Online co-op

- Player customization

- Mandatory upgrade mechanics

- Hollywood-tier voice talent

- Vacation button

- Stunning environments

- Lackluster menus

- Epic music by Leonovsky
